data.message:
To everybody mad at him for drawing the line;

If you listened to Mosh, and you saw how he went after George Bush, then you knew his political stance 10+ years ago. You have no room to be suprised that he went after Trump. You knew it was coming, its SLIM fucking SHADY. The man born without a fuck to give. So stay mad, because it changes nothing.

replies.message: Actually this song came at a moment in my life where i drew a similar line. It was if he put my thoughts into words
Damn i hadnt made that comparison , Mosh is awesome!
You're right it changes nothing. And neither did those lyrics!
I've been saying the SAME thing.
He dissed Trump earlier in "No Favors" too.
Lmao he attacked him in mosh and even in other freestyles where he said "Bush is pussy why do you think they call him bush cause puss is bushy" lmao
He's a hypocrite is what he is

Well that's the thing he attacked bush. Which is fine and now Trump which is also fine. But this time he attacked his own fans who support Trump. Which is not fine. I am ok on his political views and he makes great music. But to bash his own fans for thier own political views. Idk I'll still listen to his music but lost some respect for him to target his own fans who support him.

He's always bashed politicians which is fine. But you don't say fuck you to your fans for having different political views. It's like not being friends with someone because they voted for a candidate you didn't like.
LOUDER PLEASE...the row behind wasnt listening

Anthoney Moore but look at his body of work. He's ALWAYS been at extremes. "Either you're with me or you're not." That's part of who he is as an artist. He's been putting out things that piss people off for his entire career. Did you really think he'd start holding back now?
mosh was 🔥too 💜💚💛💙
I say good for him, he doesn't give a fuck if his 'fans' are pissed because he doesn't want the fans he dissed - he has enough without them and I respect his integrity!
He was silent for 8 years. That’s the point.
Because Obama was in office for 8 years
And Trump endorsed Eminem in 2004
Dave Nystrom Yeah, Eminem is a traitor
Dave Nystrom Trump endorsed Ed Gillespie in the VA elections, and then slammed him when he lost.
Sara Brannon Trump is a traitor
Christian Stayler yes. Among other things.
Sara we need to get caught by your bf on your bed
Thank God for the block button
No one cares about Trump, or that he dissed him. Why can’t none your people understand one simple thing, fans got mad because he made his fans choose. His fans have nothing to do with any president.
Marshall for president?
